availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: St. Louis, Missouri, physician. Kentucky native. Graduated from Centre College in Danville, Boyle County, Kentucky, in 1848. Physician in St. Louis County, Missouri, in 1863. Physician in St. Louis in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Missouri, St. Louis County, St. Louis Ward 6, p. 259B.
Internal Revenue Assessment Lists for Kentucky, 1862-1866 NARA RG 58, Microfilm Series M776, Roll 2, St. Louis County, Missouri 1863, p. 77.
Missouri, Wills and Probate Records, 1766-1988, Missouri Probate Courts, St. Louis County Wills, Probate Case File No. 20116-20136, 1893.
Catalogue of the Officers and Students of Centre College, Danville, Kentucky, (Lexington, KY: Observer and Reporter Office, 1848), p. 6.
Edward's Annual Director to the Inhabitants, Institutions, Incorporated Companies, Manufacturing Establishments, Business, Business Firms, &c., in the City of St. Louis, For 1864, (St. Louis, MO: Richard Edwards, 1864), p. 731.
"Dr. John C. Magoffin (1818-1893)," Find A Grave, Memorial 188124646, accessed October 25, 2022, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/188124646.
